name: Tractor Pull
description:
Hook your tractor to the sled and give it a pull.

Rev up the tractor to get your turbo boost spun and engine warm then slowly, but quickly, drop the clutch and let it rip.

Drag the sled over 300 feet to get a full pull.

Get cash to buy more tractors, while upgrading your tractor to win events.

Master race classes and pick up a sponsor.

Get all 90 tractors and trucks.
Win all 81 tournaments.
Play VS friends to be the best
Don't blow up your tractor...parts are expensive.
Pull in Tug of War and Accuracy events

Pull against facebook friends to win Tractor Pull cash.

Easy to play tricky to master.
